page.title: 02Wootton CofE Market Garden.
page.content: Six girls from the primary school cultivate a vegetable plot as a market garden project.They record the progress of their weekly work and keep accounts. At the end of each growing season they sell their produce to the village store and direct to villagers.All profit is sent to Mrs.Hirsh's son at Mok Taew school in Thailand.Mrs.Hirsh is the owner of the garden.The money is used to buy seed and petrol for a two-wheeled iron buffalo tractor.The money also allowed Mok Taew children to plant twice a year especially maize,runner beans and other vegetables. The children have exchanged photographs of each others' work and plan to exchange tapes in each others' languages.
